11#ifndef MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AEC3_ECHO_PATH_VARIABILITY_H_
12#define MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AEC3_ECHO_PATH_VARIABILITY_H_
13
14namespace webrtc {
15
16struct EchoPathVariability {
17 enum class DelayAdjustment {
18 kNone,
19 kBufferFlush,
20 kNewDetectedDelay
21 };
22
23 EchoPathVariability(bool gain_change,
24 DelayAdjustment delay_change,
25 bool clock_drift);
26
27 bool AudioPathChanged() const {
28 return gain_change || delay_change != DelayAdjustment::kNone;
29 }
30 bool gain_change;
31 DelayAdjustment delay_change;
32 bool clock_drift;
33};
34
35} // namespace webrtc
36
37#endif // MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AEC3_ECHO_PATH_VARIABILITY_H_
38
